content:
alexcrichton closed issue #2628:

Hello wasmtime team,

I'm one of the co-chairs of the CNCF SIG-Runtime, I think it would be great for you to present/discuss wasmtime at one of our meetings. For example, discuss things such as general architecture, use cases, current state of the project, etc. I think the community would greatly benefit from it.

Let me know if this something you'd be interested in doing. If yes, please feel free to add it to our agenda or reach out to me (raravena80 at gmail.com)

Thanks!

alexcrichton commented on issue #2628:

This is a pretty old issue at this point and I believe the event has since passed, so I'm going to close this.

raravena80 commented on issue #2628:

@alexcrichton it didn't happen yet. Can the wasmtime make it happen? Thx!

alexcrichton commented on issue #2628:

Personally I feel this is best left to individuals rather than an open issue on the project. If you're interested in getting discussions/presentations I might recommend a Zulip thread for this rather than an issue report on GitHub.
